metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19045 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
keepalived 2.0.8 used mode 0666 when creating new temporary files upon a call to PrintData or PrintStats, potentially leaking sensitive information.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

keepalived - 1:2.0.10-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xenial and earlier don't have dbus support

criterions.comment: keepalived package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.10-1').
